thread.title: Treasury’s Jacob Lew Calls on World Leaders to Step Up ‘Political Will’ to Boost Growth
thread.title_full: Treasury’s Jacob Lew Calls on World Leaders to Step Up ‘Political Will’ to Boost Growth - WSJ

author: Ian Talley
title: Treasury’s Jacob Lew Calls on World Leaders to Step Up ‘Political Will’ to Boost Growth
text:
LIMA, Peru—The world’s finance officials must avoid resorting to “beggar-thy-neighbor” policies to revive growth, U.S. Treasury Secretary Jacob Lew said Thursday as economic leaders confronted an increasingly dour outlook for the global economy.
Mr. Lew, meeting with counterparts from around the world, called on countries to overhaul their economies and boost spending if they have room in their budgets. Finance officials have committed “not to undertake competitive devaluation, not to rely excessively on one policy...
